text: Petrovichi () is the name of several rural localities in Russia: *Petrovichi, Khabarovsk Krai, a selo in imeni Lazo District of Khabarovsk Krai *Petrovichi, Primorsky Krai, a selo in Khorolsky District of Primorsky Krai *Petrovichi, Ryazan Oblast, a selo in Vypolzovsky Rural Okrug of Spassky District in Ryazan Oblast *Petrovichi, Smolensk Oblast, a village in Russkovskoye Rural Settlement of Shumyachsky District in Smolensk Oblast; birthplace of Isaac Asimov ==See also== * Petrovici (disambiguation) * Petrovići (disambiguation)
title: Petrovichi
